body_html:
Yup, I believe that the gradient of tf.linalg.expm is not implemented. Perhaps we can refer to theano.tensor.slinalg.ExpmGrad:

https://github.com/bishax/Theano/blob/a61962e10f3813ab68ba28d8253bb002144bd4b8/theano/tensor/slinalg.py#L387
body_text:
Yup, I believe that the gradient of tf.linalg.expm is not implemented. Perhaps we can refer to theano.tensor.slinalg.ExpmGrad:
https://github.com/bishax/Theano/blob/a61962e10f3813ab68ba28d8253bb002144bd4b8/theano/tensor/slinalg.py#L387
body:
Yup, I believe that the gradient of `tf.linalg.expm` is not implemented. Perhaps we can refer to theano.tensor.slinalg.ExpmGrad:

https://github.com/bishax/Theano/blob/a61962e10f3813ab68ba28d8253bb002144bd4b8/theano/tensor/slinalg.py#L387
